main.name: Beau Hale
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe HTML, CSS, Javascript and React
main.bio: Experienced Front End web developer with Full Stack developer experience and education. I am a bootcamp graduate with an extensive background in various coding languages, developing mobile apps, and building websites from the ground up. Detail-oriented and design mindset. 20+ years of experience in the salon industry which gives me expert level design and aesthetics to my work. I also have an interest in UI/UX, which ensures that my websites and apps are both beautiful and user-friendly.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me!  I would love to talk.

education.description: 6 month full-time Full Stack Immersion program.  Mastering HTML, CSS, Javascript, React & React Router, Git & Github, TDD Testing, Asynchronous programming, fetch APIs, Frontend deployment, Node & Express, Postgres, Backend deployment.

education.degree: Certificate in Front End and Mobile development
education.description: 6 month remote Frontend + Mobile development program. Foundational beginnings in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React & React Native, MongoDb, Node, Express.

work.title: Senior Front End Developer
work.description: I worked closely with the product manager and UI/UX team to deliver clients’s vision and their users’ needs. Apart of a Agile team, working in Scrum sprints designing large-scale digital experiences using technologies such as Javascript, CSS, React, Angular, AWS and more.  Involved with the full spectrum of the digital creative process, from user requirements, front end to full stack development. Advocated for the prioritizations of design-centered changes, refinements, and improvements.

work.title: Lead Instructor
work.description: Led a cohort of 20+ students through a 6 month full stack web development program.  Created and gave lectures, lessons and study in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, and Ruby on Rails.  Aligned with Educational team to plan out cohort curriculum.  Used AGILE methodologies and best practices for consistent workflows.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Aligned with the dev team on the company website and migration to Mobile Apps. Created custom CSS design and utilized Asana for workflow.  Implemented React and Python logic in mobile designs.  Assisted Senior Developer on building a cross-platform app for company success.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Collaborated with senior devs to develop projects for websites throughout phases of the project's life cycle.  Developed cross-browser and cross-device compatibility in graded browser super environment.  Maintained existing code and functionality during migration into ongoing operations of web businesses.

testimonials.text: Beau is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend!
Learning with Beau has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
